sentences: Bernhard Lewkovitch (born 28 May 1927) is a Danish composer, educated at the musical conservatories at Paris and KÃ¸benhavn.
He has worked as an organist and cantor at the Catholic St. Ansgar's Cathedral in Copenhagen.
Lewkovitch's style moved from modality to serialism in the 1950s, and he has also worked with avant-garde techniques.
